attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Your plan to make unemployed work for their benefits is only a start and will fail unless there are jobs for the almost unemployable. I have worked getting unemployed over 50's back to work in Slough and in some cases they would not get through an interview for any job. They, and many over 65's who want to work, need to be assigned jobs in subsidised employment so that they can prove their worth in action.
